turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about A Motown Christmas.
turn.1: What is the name of the album, A Motown Christmas?
turn.2: A Motown Christmas A Motown Christmas is a Christmas music compilation album, originally released as a 2-LP set by Motown Records on September 25, 1973.
turn.3: What songs were on the album?
turn.4: It contains various seasonal singles and album tracks recorded by some of the label's artists from the 1960s and early 1970s.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Much of the music had previously been collected on the 1968 UK compilation "Merry Christmas from Motown".
turn.8: The music has several times been recycled into different packagings.
turn.10: In 1992, the album was reissued on compact disc, with all 24 tracks from the original album on one CD.
turn.11: Did they do anything else with it?
turn.12: In 1999, a new single-CD version was released, with a bonus track by Marvin Gaye added ("I Want to Come Home for Christmas").
